name: avr-asm-navigator
description: Hover, definition, completion, and symbol lookup helpers for AVR® assembly projects.

avrAsmHints.dfpPath.description: Path to a DFP root folder. If empty, it is auto-detected from .vscode/*.mplab.json packs, then resolved from installed Microchip® *_DFP packs.

avrAsmHints.device.description: AVR® device name override (example: AVR64DA32). If empty, it is auto-detected from .vscode/*.mplab.json and then inferred from the active DFP.

avrAsmHints.autoDetectMplabProject.description: Auto-detect device and DFP pack from .vscode/*.mplab.json files.

avrAsmHints.maxHoverResults.description: Maximum pack symbol matches shown in hover.

avrAsmHints.maxCompletionItems.description: Maximum completion items returned for project/pack symbols.

avrAsmHints.enableCompletion.description: Enable completion items from local labels and active-target pack symbols.

avrAsmHints.enableReferences.description: Enable Find References provider for AVR® assembly symbols.

avrAsmHints.includeDfpInWorkspaceSymbols.description: Include DFP symbols in workspace symbol search results.

avrAsmHints.maxWorkspaceScanFiles.description: Maximum workspace assembly files scanned for references/workspace symbols.

avrAsmHints.maxWorkspaceSymbols.description: Maximum symbols returned from workspace symbol search.

avrAsmHints.maxReferenceResults.description: Maximum locations returned by Find References.
